episodes.title: Cults, Cashiers, and Cringe Casting: A Deep Dive into Dysfunction
episodes.description:
Welcome back to another eye-opening episode of Two Tired Therapists! This week, Kyle and Jackie pull back the curtain on the mysterious and manipulative world of cults, breaking down how they operate, why people join, and what psychological tactics cult leaders use to control their followers. But first, Kyle needs to get something off his chest—why do people insist on putting money down on the counter instead of handing it directly to the cashier? Meanwhile, Jackie’s over the ridiculous casting on reality dating shows—are they even trying to find real connections anymore?

In this episode, your two favorite therapists explore the psychology behind cults, from the recruitment process to the mind control techniques that keep members trapped. They share real-world examples of famous cults and offer insights into how to recognize when something is veering into cult territory. To close things out, Jackie challenges Kyle to a quiz on the strangest cult rituals—will he know which ones are real?

Stay connected with your Two Tired Therapists on Instagram (@twotiredtherapists), Facebook (Two Tired Therapists), or send them your thoughts at twotiredtherapists@gmail.com. And don’t forget to leave a review—we might just read it on a future episode!


Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/two-tired-therapists--5762941/support.

episodes.title: Title is Love Has Won… But There Are No Winners Here
episodes.description: Get ready for the ascension, because we're diving into some uncharted territory with the wildest documentary that your favorite Two Tired Therapists have seen to date. But before the colloidal silver hits, Jackie is pulling her hair out over autocorrect making a mess of her texts, while Kyle’s fed up with the body positivity movement, especially when tiny, skinny people are at the center of it. This week, we're unraveling the eerie story of "Love Has Won: The Cult of Mother God." Jackie gives a detailed account of this bizarre cult and its enigmatic leader, while Kyle breaks down the psychological aspects that made people fall for it. Later on, they play Fetch or Flop: Iconic Daytime Talk Show Edition. Don’t forget to connect with your two tired therapists through e-mail (twotiredtherapists@gmail.com), Instagram (@twotiredtherapists), and Facebook (Two Tired Therapists). Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/two-tired-therapists--5762941/support .
